verses.text: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w commend|strong="G4921"\w* \w unto|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w Phoebe|strong="G5402"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* sister, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w servant|strong="G1249"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* Cenchreæ:

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G3588"\w*, \w mark|strong="G4648"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w causing|strong="G4160"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w divisions|strong="G1370"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* occasions \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w stumbling|strong="G4625"\w*, \w contrary|strong="G3844"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w learned|strong="G3129"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w turn|strong="G1578"\w* \w away|strong="G1578"\w* \w from|strong="G3844"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* fellow-worker saluteth \w you|strong="G5210"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lucius|strong="G3066"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jason|strong="G2394"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Sosipater|strong="G4989"\w*, \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w kinsmen|strong="G4773"\w*.
